easyStandard.skull: Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on a _Possessed_ enemy in play.
easyStandard.cultist: -2. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.
easyStandard.elderThing: -X. X is the shroud value of your location.

hardExpert.skull: Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on the _Possessed_ enemy in play with the most remaining health.
hardExpert.cultist: -3. Place 1 of your clues on your location.
hardExpert.elderThing: -X. X is the shroud value of your location. If you fail, take 1 damage.
